timeout.description: The allowed timeout in seconds configured for Infection.

directories.description: Contains all folders with source code you want to mutate.

excludes.description: Contains all folders or files you want to exclude withing your source folders.

summary.definition: Summary log file, which display the amount of mutants per category, (Killed, Errored, Escaped, Timed Out & Not Covered).

debug.description: Debug log file, which displays what mutations were found on what line, per category.

perMutator.description: Markdown file which will give a break-down of the effectiveness of each mutator.

branch.description: Mutation score badge for your github project.

tmpDir.description: Folder where Infection creates its configs, caches and other stuff.

configDir.description: Path to directory containing PHPUnit configuration file.

mutators.description: Contains the settings for different mutations and profiles

testFramework.description: Sets the framework to use for testing. Defaults to phpunit.

bootstrap.description: Use to specify a file to include as part of the startup to pre-configure the infection environment. Useful for adding custom autoloaders not included in composer.

initialTestsPhpOptions.description: Specify an additional php options for the initial test (IE: Enabling X-Debug). --initial-tests-php-options will override this option.

testFrameworkOptions.description: Specify an additional options to pass to the test framework (IE: Enabling Verbose Mode). --test-framework-options will override this option.
